ABOUT US

We at Copy & Supplies (ijstartcanonx.com) work towards a unique goal of being the one stop destination for all kinds of printing needs for Home & Offices. Our aim is to provide the most impeccable service in North America. Our method of functioning involves procuring the most genuine and affordable products directly from multiple OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and shipping directly to the consumer without any middle man. We always stay updated with the latest products and trends and will keep our customers updated too.We strive to add better products to our catalog with time. Happy Shopping !

Disclaimer

We are an independent third party tech support team of ijstartcanonx.com. We provide an extensive range of services, especially to Canon printer users. ijstartcanonx.com renders easy instructions for the printer setup process, installation, and printer related queries. We are not associated with the manufacturer or any other third party system. We do respect other company’s brand name, logo, image and product information, and we assure that these used in our ijstartcanonx.com are only for reference purpose. We disclaim any ownership and are not liable for any product warranty issued by the manufacturer.
